item.title: The Mechanics of Flight: How Do Drones Fly?
item.description: Drones, also known as unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), have become increasingly popular for various applications. In this blog post, we explore the principles and technology behind how drones fly and the components that make it possible.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Defying Gravity: The Science Behind Airplanes Staying Aloft
item.description: Have you ever marveled at the sight of an airplane soaring through the sky and wondered how these massive machines manage to stay airborne? In this blog post, we uncover the scientific principles that allow airplanes to defy gravity and explore the fascinating world of aerodynamics.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
